name: Clive in Exile
overview: Clive is going to Spain in his C5 and it's up to you to get him there in time for the Bull Fight. You will start the game with only 1 life. The drive through England is your only chance to pick up extra lives (Batteries). Avoid all the Nasties and pick up as many BATTERIES as you can. These will act as your lives for the rest of the game. A maximum of 6 lives can be gained.
